name: Cress And Barley Salad
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, more for tossing
3 cups coarsely chopped watercress, trimmed, washed and dried

recipeInstructions.text: Cook barley in enough boiling salted water to cover, until swollen and barely tender, about 20 minutes. Drain, rinse briefly in cool water, and set aside. If you like, you can toss barley with a tablespoon or so of olive oil, and refrigerate for several hours.
When ready to serve, toss cress with barley. Stir in olive oil and lemon juice, then add salt and pepper to taste. Adjust seasoning as necessary, and serve.
